name: @CommandGlobb
author: AFNI Developers
description: A command-line tool to execute a specified program command line on a list of input bricks.

inputs.description: The entire command line for the program desired. The command is best put between single quotes, do not use the \ to break a long line within the quotes.
inputs.name: Program Command Line

inputs.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: If the program requires a -prefix option, then you can specify the extension which will get appended to the Brick names before +orig.
inputs.name: Output Extension Prefix

inputs.description: A list of bricks (or anything) on which the program command will be executed.
inputs.name: Brick List
